Package code.java.chat.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatMessageWriter
    An instance of this class writes ChatMessages across a network.
    ChatServer
    An instance of this class is a server of a chat room hosted on PORT_NUMBER.
    ChatServerClientHandler
    An instance of this class handles a single chat client in a chat room.
    ChatServerView
    An instance of this class is the graphical or command-line front end for the server of a chat room hosted on PORT_NUMBER.
